name.hi: การตกปลาขนาดเล็ก

short.am,ar,bg,bn,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Play Tiny Fishing as a Chrome extension - Try it now!
short.ca: ¡Juega a Tiny Fishing como extensión de Chrome - Pruébalo ahora!
short.es,ms: Juega a Tiny Fishing como una extensión de Chrome - ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.et: Mängi Tiny Fishingut Chrome'i laiendusena - Proovi kohe järgi!
short.fil: Maglaro ng Tiny Fishing bilang isang Chrome extension - Subukan mo na ngayon!
short.he,lt,no: ¡Juega a Tiny Fishing como una extensión de Chrome - ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.hu: Játssz a Tiny Fishinggal Chrome-bővítményként - Próbáld ki most!
short.it: Gioca a Tiny Fishing come estensione di Chrome - Provalo ora!
short.ja: Chrome拡張機能としてTiny Fishingをプレイしてみてください！
short.lv: Spēlējiet Tiny Fishing kā Chrome paplašinājumu - Izmēģiniet tagad!
short.nl: Speel Tiny Fishing als een Chrome-uitbreiding - Probeer het nu!
short.ru: Играй в Tiny Fishing как расширение для Chrome - Попробуй сейчас!
short.sk: Hrajte Tiny Fishing ako rozšírenie pre Chrome - Vyskúšajte teraz!
short.sl: Igrajte Tiny Fishing kot razširitev za Chrome - poskusite zdaj!
short.th: เล่น Tiny Fishing ในรูปแบบของส่วนเสริม Chrome - ลองดูเลย!
short.tr: Oyunu şimdi denemek için Tiny Fishing Chrome uzantısı olarak oynayın!
short.vi: Chơi Tiny Fishing như một tiện ích mở rộng trên Chrome - Hãy thử ngay bây giờ!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Playing "Tiny Fishing" is as easy as casting a line into a calm pond! Here's a simple guide to get you started:

🎣 Cast Your Line: Using the arrow keys on your keyboard, position your virtual fishing rod at the desired location in the water. Press and hold the up arrow key to charge your cast, then release to send your bait flying into the water.

🎣 Monitor Your Bobber: Keep a close watch on the bobber floating on the surface of the water. When a fish nibbles on your bait, the bobber will dip beneath the surface, signaling a bite.

🎣 Hook the Fish: When you see the bobber dip, quickly press the spacebar to hook the fish. Timing is crucial, so be ready to react promptly.

🎣 Reel It In: After hooking the fish, continue pressing the spacebar to reel it in. Pay attention to the tension gauge to avoid applying too much pressure and potentially snapping your line.

🎣 Catch More Fish: Repeat the process to catch as many fish as you'd like. Explore different fishing spots and experiment with casting techniques to increase your catch.

🎣 Enjoy the Serenity: Take a moment to appreciate the tranquil surroundings, listen to the soothing sounds of nature, and immerse yourself in the peaceful atmosphere of "Tiny Fishing."
